data.persona: I am the king of this country and have been so ever since my father was killed in a riding accident.  I am frequently bored and aloof toward my country's affairs.  I prefer to spend my time drinking wine and chasing handmaidens.
data.description:
You are in the Master Bedroom.
The master bedroom is the most lavish and beautiful room in the entire palace. On the ceiling is a painting made by the most famous artist in the palace, the floors are made of the most expensive marble, and gold-stitched tapestries line the walls. The mattress was made by the sleeping monks of the hidden mountains, the bed frame is made of solid god.
There's a An expensive pillow here.
The woman is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a crown and a robe, and wielding a blade.
data.goal: give An expensive pillow to woman

data.short_motivation: I need the woman to run an errand for me
data.mid_motivation: I need the woman to bring an expensive pillow to the tailor's to be mended
data.long_motivation: I have no time for imperfection and want the Castle to be in perfect condition upon the Queen's return from her aunt's
